name: 3tonker.io
description:
Hi there

this is my fanmade tank shooter game. If you know about diep.io or arras.io you will get the idea.

3tonker.io

unlike most tank games, 3tonker.io is 3D.

how to play

    start by selecting a gamemode (There are not many right now)

    enter your name and click the plus (the join button)

    move around by using WASD and shoot with LMB

    earn points by destroying things, there is food lying around but things WILL attack you so be careful

    Be patient, the food will take multiple shots to destroy

Right now the game is in a testing phase so everything including your tank will be out of the ordinary for now
